Peerbound - Founding full stack engineer - New York, NY - Onsite most days

We're looking for a frontend-leaning full stack engineer to be part of a 3-person engineering team here at Peerbound (peerbound.com). If you join us, you'll take on ownership of our frontend and play a huge role in shaping the technical direction and team. Our stack currently includes TypeScript, React, Python, and Azure.

Peerbound is leveraging the latest technologies (including AI, of course) to supercharge marketers' productivity and change how they go about their jobs.

Check out the LinkedIn job post for more details: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/3937094482/
